channel.title: Infos on Clare and Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Infos on Clare and Taylor

item.title: nearest airports and train stations
item.description: BWI (Baltimore) about an hour and fifteen minutes from Easton. between BWI and the Eastern Shore, you must cross the Chesapeake Bay Bridge (which is under construction and known for its traffic!) there is a shuttle between BWI and the Easton Airport (this is a very small airport, and does not offer commercial flights). ILG (Wilmington) avoids the Bay Bridge, but may be a bit more expensive

item.title: places to stay
item.description: The Inn at Perry Cabin a luxury resort and spa fewer rooms available than the options below Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott call to book: (410) 822-0050 mention that you're a part of the O'Brien/Brown wedding to obtain discounted rates ($199.00) they will release the rooms 60 days before the event–be sure to book ASAP!
